description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base with Thai recipes, sets up an agent with search capabilities, and runs asynchronous methods to load the knowledge base and generate a response to a query about Tom Kha Gai.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: PDFBytesKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that stores PDF content as bytes and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation used for storing and querying PDF embeddings.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads or reloads the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a given query, optionally in markdown format.

calls: asyncio.run(agent.aprint_response("How to make Tom Kha Gai?", markdown=True))
